page.title: 16Events in Rogate
page.content: Saturday the 3rd of August was the day of the annual Flower Show held on the recreation ground. There were classes for adults in photography, horticulture, cooking, wine making needlework,floral art, besides some for children in handwriting, craft and illustrations. Although the weather was uncertain it was well attended. A recipe for Old Sussex Carrot Cake using raw carrots and walnuts was to be made for class 63. The use of marmalade with an orange helps to give it a delicious flavour. All the profits from the show go towards the upkeep of the village hall and the recreation ground.
